= Algebra Agent =
Agent that can solve algebra problems. Uses a tree structure to represent an algebra problem. As of 2/2012, can only solve simple problems.

=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Basic PSCM functions: State Elaboration, Operator Proposal, Operator Evaluation, Internal Operator Application, Semantic Memory
